CHATS.CONFIRM_CHATROOM_DELETE: This will delete this room and all messages.  Do you want to continue?
CHATS.JOIN_ROOM_DISCLAIMER: Joining this room means you will begin to receive messages from other members and your messages will be public. Do you want to continue?
CHATS.CHAT_HISTORY_ERROR: There was a problem retrieving the chat history
CHATS.CHAT_ERROR: There was a problem connecting to the chat server

TICKETS.ADD_EVENT_INSTRUCTIONS: Fill out the additonal fields below about the event.  All fields are required
TICKETS.DELETE_TICKET_WALLET: Do you really want to delete this ticket?  This cannot be undone
TICKETS.ENTER_BARCODE_INSTRUCTIONS: Click 'Enter' to manually enter a barcode or click 'Scan' to scan directly from ticket
TICKETS.EVENT_NOT_FOUND: Event not found. Press 'Enter' to use this name
TICKETS.CASH_PAYMENT_ANNOUNCMENT: Please note that this is a cash payment feature!  You must collect payment directly from the purchaser.
TICKETS.NO_TICKETS_ASSIGNED_TO_YOU: No tickets have been assigned to you.  Please contact the Event Administrator
TICKETS.NO_TICKETS_SAVED: You haven't added any tickets to your wallet, click in the toolbar above to add tickets

EVENTS.HEADLINE: Headline
EVENTS.SELLER_DISCLAIMER: In using this service you agree to be charged TT$0.99 per ticket sold. Please contact Suntixx Caribbean Limited for your coupon code
EVENTS.NO_MANAGED_EVENTS: You don't have any events. Click on the in the toolbar to create an event now

REPORTS.NO_COMMITTEE_MEMBERS: You don't seem to have assigned any box office sellers to this event.
REPORTS.NO_SALES_REPORT: You have not yet sold any tickets for this event

ACCESS.BARCODE_NOT_FOUND: No Barcode Found. Please Try Again!
ACCESS.NO_BARCODES_SCANNED: You have not scanned any barcodes yet
ACCESS.NO_TICKETS_FOUND: This Event does not have any tickets

STORE.COLLECT_MONEY_MSG: Sale was successful. Don't forget to collect the money
STORE.ERROR_GENERATING_CART: There was an error generating your checkout cart
STORE.CONFIRM_SALE: Do you want to complete this sale. This cannot be undone
STORE.CONFIRM_DELETE_TICKETTYPE: Are you sure you want to remove this ticket
STORE.PURCHASE_ERROR:
There was a problem during the transaction. I can't verify that the purchase was completed.
If you do not receive your tickets, please contact us at 868 288 8499 or info@suntixx.com.
STORE.PURCHASE_FORCE: You sold # tickets to # within the last 15 minutes, do you want to continue with this sale?
STORE.PURCHASE_SUCCESSFUL:
Congratulations, your purchase was successful.
Thanks for your business and please enjoy the event!
STORE.SALE_ERROR:
There was a problem during the transaction. I can't verify that the sale was completed so you should check with the purchaser before proceeding.
What would you like to do?
STORE.SALE_SUCCESSFUL:
Congratulations, your sale was successful.
Please remember to collect the cash!
STORE.QUANTITY_NEEDED: A Quantity is required to continue
STORE.CHECKOUT_PURCHASE_ERROR: There was an error.  Please verify your purchased tickets before trying again
STORE.CHECKOUT_SELL_ERROR: There was an error.  Please verify your sold tickets before trying again
